page.title: 09THE JERSEY FARM
page.content: { FIRST STOP-THE CALF HOUSE-}There were nine calves altogether (all very cute).They sucked our fingers.We liked the brown and white one best. Most of the calves were being weaned off milk using a mixture called Calf Weaner Feed.Along with this they had hay,bruised barley and water. {NEXT STOP-THE BYRE_}The byre held 12 cows and 4 could be milked at one time.Mr Lindsay was still carrying the milk from the byre to the bulk tank ,but was in the process of building a pipeline direct from the byre to the bulk tank. {COWS IN THE FIELD_}The whole herd was out grazing in the field.When they saw us they came to look at us.There was a big Jersey bull.He looked very fierce. (He has to be,to protect the docile cows).We stayed here a long time watching the cows grazing,lying down,
